encounters.name: Storms and Turbulence
encounters.description: You encounter a sudden thunderstorm with heavy turbulence.

outcome.success: You manage to navigate through the storm, but the rough weather delays your delivery slightly.
outcome.failure: The turbulence causes damage to your cargo and delays your delivery significantly. Repair costs are incurred.

outcome.success: You avoid the storm entirely, but it adds some extra time to your route.
outcome.failure: A miscalculation in your new route adds a significant delay and increases fuel consumption.

reaction_options.option: Land and wait for the storm to pass

outcome.success: You safely land at a nearby airstrip and wait for the storm to pass, though you lose time waiting.

encounters.name: Icing Conditions
encounters.description: Ice starts forming on your wings, affecting the plane's performance.

outcome.success: The de-icing system works perfectly, and the ice melts away.
outcome.failure: The de-icing system malfunctions, and you lose engine power temporarily, causing a rough landing.

outcome.success: You successfully descend into warmer air, melting the ice.
outcome.failure: The ice worsens during the descent, and you are forced to make an emergency landing.

reaction_options.option: Continue flying and hope the ice melts

outcome.success: The ice melts on its own, and the flight continues normally.
outcome.failure: The ice buildup becomes critical, and you lose control of the plane, leading to a crash landing.

encounters.name: Fuel Shortage
encounters.description: You realize mid-flight that your fuel is running dangerously low due to a leak.

outcome.success: You safely land at a nearby airport and refuel, avoiding disaster.
outcome.failure: Unexpected traffic at the airport delays your landing, and the fuel runs out mid-approach, forcing an emergency landing.

outcome.success: You successfully conserve enough fuel to make it to your destination.
outcome.failure: Despite conserving fuel, you still run out and have to make a forced landing in a nearby field.

reaction_options.option: Push through to destination at normal speed

outcome.success: You barely make it to your destination as the fuel runs out just after landing.
outcome.failure: You run out of fuel mid-flight and have to make an emergency landing in a remote area.

encounters.name: Engine Malfunction
encounters.description: One of your engines starts malfunctioning mid-flight.

reaction_options.option: Shut down the malfunctioning engine and continue with the other

outcome.success: You successfully fly with one engine and make it to the nearest airport safely.
outcome.failure: Flying on one engine causes additional strain, and the second engine fails. You have to perform an emergency landing.

outcome.success: The in-flight repair works, and the engine is restored to full functionality.
outcome.failure: The repair fails, worsening the malfunction and forcing you to shut down the engine.

reaction_options.option: Land immediately for a full repair

outcome.success: You land safely at the nearest airfield and get the engine repaired, though it takes extra time.

encounters.name: Crowded Airspace
encounters.description: Approaching your destination, you find the airspace is highly congested with air traffic.

outcome.success: You safely wait your turn to land, though it causes a delay in your delivery time.

reaction_options.option: Request priority landing from air traffic control

outcome.success: Your request is granted, and you make a swift landing, avoiding delays.
outcome.failure: Air traffic control denies your request, forcing you into a holding pattern anyway.

outcome.success: You divert to a nearby, less crowded airport, but youâ€™ll have to make alternate delivery arrangements.
outcome.failure: The nearby airport is also crowded, causing even further delays.

encounters.name: Delivery Mix-Up
encounters.description: Mid-flight, you realize that part of your cargo is labeled incorrectly, and the destination is wrong.

outcome.success: You divert to the correct destination and successfully deliver the cargo, though it adds extra time.
outcome.failure: Diverting leads to bad weather, delaying the delivery further and damaging the goods.

reaction_options.option: Continue to the original destination and sort it out there

outcome.success: You explain the situation at the original destination and get the cargo rerouted, though it costs extra.
outcome.failure: The client is unhappy with the mistake, leading to a penalty or lost reputation.

reaction_options.option: Ignore the issue and hope it works out

outcome.success: Against the odds, the recipient accepts the mislabeled cargo without issue.
outcome.failure: The recipient refuses the cargo, causing a significant delay and reputation damage.
